channel.title: New SCAR User!
channel.description:
I'm bubbagump, and I want to macro on RS2! There is all but one problem...where do i put the script and play it so I can macro and get a chuck of cash!
I need step by step instructions on a SAFE and SECURE thingy to macro with. All I know is that i gotta copy and paste the code onto the thingy...that's as far as Shadow got me... Don't call me a noob or stupid or anything like that, please. I just wanna cheat.

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @bubbagump bubbagump
item.description:
@bubbagump wrote:

Thank you all, I still have trouble setting scripts up…i used one which worked for like a minute, then stoped…couldn’t get back working…Add my MSN The Un-Named or anyone who weants to really help me alot…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2007, 10:28:38 PM[/size][hr]Oh yeah, I forgot, what do people use to kill the green dragons up in 24-ish wildy…I wanna be one of those people selling 10k d-bones at a time, or get 99 prayer =p[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2007, 10:39:06 PM[/size][hr]I’m gonna use Arr0w’s Powerminer…first script that seems really easy to use…thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Java © ?:

People can’t report level 3’s unless they speak… I have tried many times…

Not if you report them for macroing.

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

just get an autofighter and lvl up and then go do the rest and u might want a autotalker with a say autominer

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @Java6 Java © ?
item.description:
@Java6 wrote:

People can’t report level 3’s unless they speak… I have tried many times…

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

The problem with autoing(don’t let me put you off), is a lot of the time, scripts don’t work, nor efficiently. If you want cash quickly, do it yourself.

But anyway, here are a few tips to help you. Autoing on a level 3 is “autoban”, people do report level 3’s, so take the time to level your character up. Also, you should check out srl-forums.com, and learn how to script.

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Nah they rarely ever do ip bans, but its best when your autoing use an unsigned applet just incase.

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @bubbagump bubbagump
item.description:
@bubbagump wrote:

So I won’t get my main banned if I use some level 3? YAY! I thought they did IP banns…

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

SCAR is not that detectable, but i would not use it on any accounts you don’t want to loose, since one little slip up in the script can cost you your account.
There is still a very high chance that you will be caught and banned so like i said, use it on some low levels your willing to loose.

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @bubbagump bubbagump
item.description:
@bubbagump wrote:

Thanks a ton! I feel dumb…BTW! Do they ban every one of your acc’s if you macro or just the macro acc?

Read full topic

item.title: New SCAR User!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

http://moparisthebest.com/downloads/SCAR312setup.exe - download this, install it then find some scripts on this forum or http://srl-forums.com that being probably the most active SCAR community around and most likely your best place to look for free scripts or even learn how to script.

Read full topic
